translations: v．使有义务，使有责任：使某人有法律或道义上的责任去做某事。
· The contract obligates the company to complete the project on time.
合同要求公司按时完成项目。

sentences.sentence: The ruling obligates airlines to release information about their flight delays.
sentences.translation: 这一裁决迫使航空公司公布航班晚点信息。

sentences.sentence: The Torah obligates the husband to meet the intimate needs of his wife.
sentences.translation: 他们的律法规定：丈夫的义务是满足妻子对于亲密感的要求。

sentences.sentence: A typical rental lease obligates the landlord to make any needed repairs.
sentences.translation: 典型的租赁合同上规定，房东必须负责任何必要的维修。
